trans-unit.source: Used to provide design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Usado para fornecer suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle de servidor Web <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList" />.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> objects representing the events of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém os objetos de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor" /> que representam os eventos do controle.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> are event names.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> são nomes de evento.

trans-unit.source: Allows the designer to filter the set of events that the associated control will expose at design time.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o designer filtre o conjunto de eventos que o controle associado exporá no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PostFilterEvents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to filter the set of events that the control it is designing will expose through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PostFilterEvents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para filtrar o conjunto de eventos que o controle é projetar vai expor por meio de <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.PostFilterEvents%2A> method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event from the list that is exposed by the designer.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.PostFilterEvents%2A> método Remove o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> evento na lista que é exposto pelo designer.

trans-unit.source: The keys in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface are the names of the events.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface são os nomes dos eventos.

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> are objects of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> são objetos do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: Overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.PostFilterEvents(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method provides a way to change or remove items within the dictionary of events that are exposed by the designer for this control.
trans-unit.target: Substituindo o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.PostFilterEvents(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método fornece uma maneira de alterar ou remover itens no dicionário de eventos que são expostos pelo designer para este controle.

trans-unit.source: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the <paramref name="events" /> parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Diretamente, você pode filtrar o dicionário que pode ser acessado por meio de <paramref name="events" /> parâmetro, ou você pode deixá-la inalterada.

trans-unit.source: If you are overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.PostFilterEvents(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.
trans-unit.target: Se você está substituindo o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.PostFilterEvents(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método, chame a implementação base depois de executar seus próprios recursos de filtragem.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado ao designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade é sempre `true`, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle que contém uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle não afeta qualquer persistência para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property were to return `false`, the designer would use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade fosse retornar `false`, o designer usaria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="false" /> ou para determinar seu valor com base em se o controle está marcado com um nível de classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner" /> object ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propriedade não for substituída, o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BulletedListDesigner" /> objeto ignora o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
